A=0.0 0.5 0.5
  0.5 0.0 0.5
  0.5 0.5 0.0;

R1=0.707106781186548 -0.707106781186548 0
   0.707106781186548  0.707106781186548 0
   0 0 1;

R2= 0.707106781186548  0.707106781186548 0
   -0.707106781186548  0.707106781186548 0
    0 0 1;

misAxis=0 0 1;


p1,p2

R*p1 = a(m*p1+n*p2)

R*R*p1 = a(m*R*p1+n*R*p2)= a(a*m^2*p1+a*m*n*p2+n*R*p2)
